mapper.insert: insert into equipment (id, eqno, agentno, agentname, eqtype, status, loginName, password, position, appVersion, product, username, receivecardno, createdAt, updatedAt ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eqtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivecardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update equipment set eqno = #{eqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agentno = #{agentno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, agentname = #{agentname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eqtype = #{eqtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, loginName = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appVersion = #{appversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product = #{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receivecardno = #{receivecardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createdAt = #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatedAt = #{updatedat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, eqno, agentno, agentname, eqtype, status, loginName, password, position, appVersion, product, username, receivecardno, createdAt, updatedAt from equipment where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, eqno, agentno, agentname, eqtype, status, loginName, password, position, appVersion, product, username, receivecardno, createdAt, updatedAt from equipment
SELECT * FROM equipment e WHERE e.eqno = #{param2} AND e.eqtype = #{param1} AND e.status = 1
SELECT * FROM equipment e WHERE e.status = 2
mapper.update:

#{id}
